title: So The #Haters Get Off Your Back
description:
Boston Globe's Patriots beat reporter Ben Volin tells WEEI's Greg Hill Show that a source told him everyone hates Mac Jones in Foxboro. Turns out that source was @nolanc79 and he made it up (00:05:10). Dave makes a horrible call by hanging up on Volin's voicemail message (00:00:10). Meghan Ottolini tries to defend Volin by stating the Boston Globe has "very very very high standards" and that no punishment should be enforced because he didn't write it for his employer (00:18:20). Ben Volin calls in with a few more scoops (00:22:30). Mike Felger defends Volin by stating people are only upset because it was negative news (00:30:20). Greg Hill wins a Marconi for Major Market Personality of Year (00:38:00). Courtney Cox lies and says Mac Jones cheers were borderline non-existent compared to Bailey Zappe's at a charity event earlier in the week (00:50:00). Gerry Callahan and Jeff Kuhner reunite on NewsMax, Meghan Markle complains about Deal or No Deal & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
